information.role: Developed with MarCom Group: creative director Curtis Nelson, designer Soon Ham
information.description: An Intranet Site for the Office of Inspector General, featuring a fully customizable draggable grid. Users define where each block links to on the site (available options are read from a data file). The blocks are draggable and can be stacked by users as they chose to.
information.mediaDetail: JS animation, cookies, popups and expandables from scratch, JSON, XML
